titleStmt.title: Salvation by Jesus Christ alone ... agreeable to the rules of reason and the laws of justice ... : to which is added a short inquiry into the state of those men in a future life who never heard of Jesus Christ ... / by Tho. Staynoe.
titleStmt.author: Staynoe, Thomas, d. 1708.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"A short inquiry, whether it does not appear from the Scriptures ..." has separate t.p. and continuous paging.
